::Aerotaur::
    Aerotaur walks up behind Nightlight.  "Hello Arrow."  He looks down at 
Hero's head.  "I think we'll get along nicely.  Just so long as you pull your 
weight around here, you'll be given respect.  If you respect others and their 
feelings you will do fine here.  As for the decapitated body, don't worry 
about him.  He's like the rabid dog that followed us home and won't go away."
